name: sbatch
description: sbatch  submits  a  batch script to SLURM.

parameterdefs.name: array
parameterdefs.description: Submit a job array, multiple jobs to be executed with identical parameters.

parameterdefs.name: account
parameterdefs.description: Charge resources used by this job to specified account.

parameterdefs.name: begin
parameterdefs.description: Submit  the  batch  script  to  the SLURM controller immediately, like normal, but tell the controller to defer the allocation of the job until the specified time.

parameterdefs.name: comment
parameterdefs.description: An arbitrary comment enclosed in double quotes if using spaces or some special characters.

parameterdefs.name: constraint
parameterdefs.description: Only nodes having features matching the job constraints will be used to satisfy the request.

parameterdefs.name: contiguous
parameterdefs.description: If set, then the allocated nodes must form a contiguous set.

parameterdefs.name: cores_per_socket
parameterdefs.description: Restrict node selection to nodes with at least the specified number of cores per socket.

parameterdefs.name: cpus_per_task
parameterdefs.description: Advise the SLURM controller that ensuing job steps will require ncpus  number  of  processors  per  task.

parameterdefs.name: dependency
parameterdefs.description: Defer  the  start  of  this  job until the specified dependencies have been satisfied.

parameterdefs.name: workdir
parameterdefs.description: Set  the working directory of the batch script before it is executed.

parameterdefs.name: error
parameterdefs.description: Instruct SLURM to connect the batch script standard error directly to the file name specified

parameterdefs.name: exclusive
parameterdefs.description: The job allocation can not share nodes with other running jobs.

parameterdefs.name: export
parameterdefs.description: Identify which environment variables are propagated to the batch job.

parameterdefs.name: export_file
parameterdefs.description: Export  environment  variables  defined in a filename or numerical file descriptor.

parameterdefs.name: nodefile
parameterdefs.description: List of nodes in a file

parameterdefs.name: get_user_env
parameterdefs.description: This  option  will  tell sbatch to retrieve the login environment variables for the user specified in the --uid option.

parameterdefs.name: scriptname
parameterdefs.description: Name of the script that will be submitted with sbatch

parameterdefs.name: gid
parameterdefs.description: If sbatch is run as root, and the --gid option is used, submit the job with group's group access permissions

parameterdefs.name: gres
parameterdefs.description: Specifies a comma delimited list of generic consumable resources.

parameterdefs.name: hold
parameterdefs.description: Specify the job is to be submitted in a held state (priority of zero).

parameterdefs.name: hint
parameterdefs.description: Bind tasks according to application hints

parameterdefs.name: immediate
parameterdefs.description: The batch script will only be submitted to the controller if the resources necessary to grant its job allocation are immediately available.

parameterdefs.name: ignore_pbs
parameterdefs.description: Ignore any #PBS options specified in the batch script.

parameterdefs.name: input
parameterdefs.description: Instruct SLURM to connect the batch script standard input directly to the file name specified

parameterdefs.name: job_name
parameterdefs.description: Instruct SLURM to connect the batch script standard input directly to the file name specified

parameterdefs.name: jobid
parameterdefs.description: Instruct SLURM to connect the batch script standard input directly to the file name specified

parameterdefs.name: no_kill
parameterdefs.description: Do not automatically terminate a job if one of the nodes it has been allocated fails

parameterdefs.name: licenses
parameterdefs.description: Specification of licenses (or other resources available on all nodes of the cluster) which must be allocated to this job.

parameterdefs.name: clusters
parameterdefs.description: Clusters to issue commands to.

parameterdefs.name: distribution
parameterdefs.description: Specify alternate distribution methods for remote processes.

parameterdefs.name: mail_type
parameterdefs.description: Notify  user  by  email when certain event types occur.

parameterdefs.name: mail_user
parameterdefs.description: User to receive email notification of state changes as defined by --mail-type.

parameterdefs.name: mem
parameterdefs.description: Specify  the  real memory required per node in MegaBytes.

parameterdefs.name: mem_per_cpu
parameterdefs.description: Mimimum memory required per allocated CPU in MegaBytes.

parameterdefs.name: mem_bind
parameterdefs.description: Mimimum memory required per allocated CPU in MegaBytes.

parameterdefs.name: mincpus
parameterdefs.description: Specify a minimum number of logical cpus/processors per node.

parameterdefs.name: nodes
parameterdefs.description: Request that a minimum of nodes be allocated to this job.  A maximum node count may also be specified.

parameterdefs.name: ntasks
parameterdefs.description: This option  advises  the  SLURM  controller that job steps run within the allocation will launch a maximum of number tasks and to provide for sufficient resources

parameterdefs.name: network
parameterdefs.description: Specify information pertaining to the switch or network.

parameterdefs.name: nice
parameterdefs.description: Run the job with an adjusted scheduling priority within SLURM.

parameterdefs.name: no_requeue
parameterdefs.description: Specifies that the batch job should not be requeued after node failure.

parameterdefs.name: ntasks_per_core
parameterdefs.description: Request a maximum number of tasks be invoked on each core.

parameterdefs.name: ntasks_per_socket
parameterdefs.description: Request a maximum number of tasks be invoked on each socket.

parameterdefs.name: ntasks_per_node
parameterdefs.description: Request that a number of tasks be invoked on each node.

parameterdefs.name: overcommit
parameterdefs.description: Overcommit resources.

parameterdefs.name: output
parameterdefs.description: Instruct  SLURM  to connect the batch script's standard output directly to the file name specified.

parameterdefs.name: open_mode
parameterdefs.description: Open the output and error files using append or truncate mode as specified.

parameterdefs.name: partition
parameterdefs.description: Open the output and error files using append or truncate mode as specified.

parameterdefs.name: priority
parameterdefs.description: Request a specific job priority.

parameterdefs.name: profile
parameterdefs.description: Enables detailed data collection by the acct_gather_profile plugin.

parameterdefs.name: parsable
parameterdefs.description: Outputs only the job id number and the cluster name if present.

parameterdefs.name: propagate
parameterdefs.description: Allows users to specify which of the modifiable (soft) resource limits to propagate to the compute nodes and apply to their jobs.

parameterdefs.name: quiet
parameterdefs.description: Suppress informational messages from sbatch.

parameterdefs.name: qos
parameterdefs.description: Request a quality of service for the job.

parameterdefs.name: requeue
parameterdefs.description: Specifies  that  the  batch job should be requeued after node failure.

parameterdefs.name: reservation
parameterdefs.description: Allocate resources for the job from the named reservation.

parameterdefs.name: share
parameterdefs.description: The job allocation can share resources with other running jobs.

parameterdefs.name: core_spec
parameterdefs.description: Count of specialized cores per node reserved by the job for system operations and not used by the application.

parameterdefs.name: signal
parameterdefs.description: When a job is within sig_time seconds of its end time, send it the signal sig_num.

parameterdefs.name: sockets_per_node
parameterdefs.description: Restrict node selection to nodes with at least the specified number of sockets.

parameterdefs.name: switches
parameterdefs.description: Restrict node selection to nodes with at least the specified number of sockets.

parameterdefs.name: time
parameterdefs.description: Set  a limit on the total run time of the job allocation.

parameterdefs.name: tasks_per_node
parameterdefs.description: Set  a limit on the total run time of the job allocation.

parameterdefs.name: test_only
parameterdefs.description: Validate the batch script and return an estimate of when a job would be scheduled to run.

parameterdefs.name: threads_per_core
parameterdefs.description: Restrict node selection to nodes with at least the specified number of threads per core.

parameterdefs.name: time_min
parameterdefs.description: Set a minimum time limit on the job allocation.

parameterdefs.name: tmp
parameterdefs.description: Specify a minimum amount of temporary disk space (in MB).

parameterdefs.name: usage
parameterdefs.description: Display brief help message and exit.

parameterdefs.name: uid
parameterdefs.description: Attempt  to  submit and/or run a job as user instead of the invoking user id.

parameterdefs.name: version
parameterdefs.description: Display version information and exit.

parameterdefs.name: verbose
parameterdefs.description: Increase  the verbosity of sbatch's informational messages.

parameterdefs.name: nodelist
parameterdefs.description: Request a specific list of hosts.

parameterdefs.name: wait_all_nodes
parameterdefs.description: Controls when the execution of the command begins.

parameterdefs.name: wckey
parameterdefs.description: Specify wckey to be used with job.

parameterdefs.name: exclude
parameterdefs.description: Explicitly exclude certain nodes from the resources granted to the job.

parameterdefs.name: command
parameterdefs.description: Command to be submitted to Slurm cluster
